ygData.subject: Nostrolo Tambourine coins
ygData.msgSnippet: First, thanks to the list for giving me the confidence and information to try to complete this quest. I ve been able to get almost all the coins needed for the
ygData.messageBody:
First, thanks to the list for giving me the confidence and information to try to complete this quest.

I've been able to get almost all the coins needed for the tambourine. I can say that the hardest coin and the only one I haven't gotten is the Kaesora coin. On Bertoxxulous there seems to be usually nobody in this dungeon. I've got a fairly small guild with maybe about 8 people who are above level 35 but we may get a Kaesora raid in the near future.

The only other coin that gave me trouble was the coin that drops off of the Scroungers in The Overthere. From what I've read in this list, though, each bard had a high level player to give them some assistance.

But I was fortunate to encounter a person who plays a 51 bard who solo'd the coin and felt that I should be able to solo it as well. He told me to get a SOW, and sing invis. Then find a scrounger, DOT it, turn on invisibility, pull the scrounger out of the canyon, then kite it.

Well the first time was disasterous. The only scrounger I found as deep in one of their temples, and when I pulled him, he aggro'd 2 others near him. I hot Harm Touched 3 times and must have left a smoking crater on their floor. :-P

The second time was better. I found a scrounger sitting outside. :-) I waited until he was by himself, then hit him with Fulfil's Chant (nice long range DOT), turned on invis and ran. I got HT'd by him but must have resisted it as it did very little damage to me. There was just one Skopikos in the way and unfortunately, he aggro'd on me as I let the scrounger get too close to me and lost my invis when he hit me (darn lag). The new one promptly Harm Touched me and the race was on.

I turned on accelerando, equipped my drum, then proceeded to charm the scrounger to beat up the lesser one. Once the 2nd one was dead I chain/feared the scrounger and got my coin. In retrospect, I'd just kite him in the future as he was pretty resistant to fear and knocked me silly a couple of times.

Incidentally, on Bertox, *nobody* hunts these things, so I wouldn't expect to be able to buy the coin from anyone nor get much assistance.

BTW, I'm a 35 bard wearing full lambent w/singing steel boots (completed totemic helm quest and traded for boots) and I'm just using a Dragoon Dirk and Staff of Writhing (as I traded away some of my other weaps). I'm planning to upgrade my weaps, but these do fine for now.

Sincerely,
Windleaf Mistsong
Clan Battlehammer
Bertox
